schemas.slideshow:
<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="slideshow">
    <xs:complexType mixed="true">
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="title"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="status"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="username"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="url"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="thumbnailurl"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="thumbnailsmallurl"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="embed"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="created"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="updated"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="language"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="format"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="download"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="downloadurl"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="slideshowtype"/>
        <xs:element name="incontest">
          <xs:complexType mixed="true">
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="userid"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="externalappuserid"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="externalappid"/>
              <xs:element name="pptlocation">
                <xs:complexType mixed="true">
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="strippedtitle"/>
                    <xs:element name="tags">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="tag">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:simpleContent>
                                <xs:extension base="xs:string">
                                  <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="count"/>
                                  <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="owner"/>
                                </xs:extension>
                              </xs:simpleContent>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="audio"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="numdownloads"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="numviews"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="numcomments"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="numfavorites"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="numslides"/>
                    <xs:element name="relatedslideshows">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="relatedslideshowid">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:simpleContent>
                                <xs:extension base="xs:string">
                                  <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="rank"/>
                                </xs:extension>
                              </xs:simpleContent>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="privacylevel"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="flagvisible"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="showonss"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secreturl"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="allowembed"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sharewithcontacts"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

schemas.user_campaign_leads:
<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="leads">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="lead">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="slideshowid"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="email"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="phoneno"/>
              <xs:element name="address">
                <xs:complexType mixed="true">
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="paidat">
                      <xs:annotation>
                        <xs:documentation></Address</xs:documentation>
                      </xs:annotation>
                      <xs:complexType mixed="true">
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="rating">
                            <xs:annotation>
                              <xs:documentation></PaidAt</xs:documentation>
                            </xs:annotation>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="createdat"/>
                          <xs:element name="updatedat">
                            <xs:complexType mixed="true">
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="message">
                                  <xs:annotation>
                                    <xs:documentation></UpdatedAt</xs:documentation>
                                  </xs:annotation>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="usercomment"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="city"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="country"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="zipcode"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="state"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mechanism"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="readat"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="deletedat"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="leadcampaignid"/>
                                <xs:element name="geodata">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="region"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="country"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="city"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="leads">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>

                      <xs:annotation>

                      </xs:annotation>

                            </xs:annotation>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="createdat"/>
                          <xs:element name="updatedat">
                            <xs:complexType mixed="true">
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="message">
                                  <xs:annotation>
                                    <xs:documentation></UpdatedAt</xs:documentation>
                                  </xs:annotation>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="usercomment"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="city"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="country"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="zipcode"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="state"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mechanism"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="readat"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="deletedat"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="leadcampaignid"/>
                                <xs:element name="geodata">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="region"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="country"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="city"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cost"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="firstname"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="lastname"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Specify the number of <<name>> to return

detailed.name: detailed
detailed.description: Set it to 1 if you want a detailed response

share_with_contacts.name: share_with_contacts
share_with_contacts.description: Sets if your contacts on SlideShare can view the slideshow. Requires make_slideshow_private to be Y

allow_embeds.name: allow_embeds
allow_embeds.description: Sets if other websites should be allowed to embed the slideshow. Requires make_slideshow_private to be Y

generate_secret_url.name: generate_secret_url
generate_secret_url.description: Generate a secret URL for the slideshow. Requires make_slideshow_private to be Y

make_slideshow_private.name: make_slideshow_private
make_slideshow_private.description: Should be Y if you want to make the slideshow private. If this is not set, following tags will not be considered

username_for.name: username_for
username_for.description: username of user whose <<name>> are being requested

end.name: end
end.description: only get <<name>> before this UTC date: YYYYMMDDHHMM

begin.name: begin
begin.description: only get <<name>> after this UTC date: YYYYMMDDHHMM

canFetchPersonalData.description: Some requests requires username and password of a requestings user.
canFetchPersonalData.name: canFetchPersonalData
canFetchPersonalData.usage: Apply this to any method that supports some user's authorization parameters.

apiKey.name: apiKey
apiKey.description: All requests made using the SlideShare API must have some parameters.

api_key.name: api_key
api_key.description: Set this to the API Key that SlideShare has provided for you.

ts.name: ts
ts.description: Set this to the current time in Unix TimeStamp format, to the nearest second(?).

hash.name: hash
hash.description: Set this to the SHA1 hash of the concatenation of the shared secret and the timestamp (ts). i.e. SHA1 (sharedsecret + timestamp). The order of the terms in the concatenation is important.

leads.name: leads
leads.usage: This type should be used for any resource that is associated with leads.

slideshow.name: slideshow
slideshow.usage: This type should be used for any resource that is associated with slideshows.

favorite.name: favorite
favorite.usage: This type should be used for any resource that is associated with favorites.

user.name: user
user.usage: This type should be used for any resource that is associated with users.

application/xml.schemaContent:
<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="slideshow">
    <xs:complexType mixed="true">
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="title"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="status"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="username"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="url"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="thumbnailurl"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="thumbnailsmallurl"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="embed"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="created"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="updated"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="language"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="format"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="download"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="downloadurl"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="slideshowtype"/>
        <xs:element name="incontest">
          <xs:complexType mixed="true">
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="userid"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="externalappuserid"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="externalappid"/>
              <xs:element name="pptlocation">
                <xs:complexType mixed="true">
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="strippedtitle"/>
                    <xs:element name="tags">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="tag">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:simpleContent>
                                <xs:extension base="xs:string">
                                  <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="count"/>
                                  <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="owner"/>
                                </xs:extension>
                              </xs:simpleContent>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="audio"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="numdownloads"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="numviews"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="numcomments"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="numfavorites"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="numslides"/>
                    <xs:element name="relatedslideshows">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="relatedslideshowid">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:simpleContent>
                                <xs:extension base="xs:string">
                                  <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="rank"/>
                                </xs:extension>
                              </xs:simpleContent>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="privacylevel"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="flagvisible"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="showonss"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secreturl"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="allowembed"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sharewithcontacts"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

slideshow_url.name: slideshow_url
slideshow_url.description: Url of the slideshow being queried for. One of Id or URL is requried

exclude_tags.name: exclude_tags
exclude_tags.description: Set it to true if you want exclude tags in the detailed response

get_transcript.name: get_transcript

slideshow_id.name: slideshow_id
slideshow_id.description: Id of the slideshow being queried for. One of Id or URL is required

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="tag">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="count"/>
        <xs:element name="slideshow" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0">
          <xs:complexType mixed="true">
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="title"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="status"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="username"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="url"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="thumbnailurl"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="thumbnailsmallurl"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="embed"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="created"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="updated"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="language"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="format"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="download"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="downloadurl"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="slideshowtype"/>
              <xs:element name="incontest">
                <xs:complexType mixed="true">
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="userid"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="externalappuserid"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="externalappid"/>
                    <xs:element name="pptlocation">
                      <xs:complexType mixed="true">
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="strippedtitle"/>
                          <xs:element name="tags">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element name="tag">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:simpleContent>
                                      <xs:extension base="xs:string">
                                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="count" use="optional"/>
                                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="owner" use="optional"/>
                                      </xs:extension>
                                    </xs:simpleContent>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="audio"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="numdownloads"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="numviews"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="numcomments"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="numfavorites"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="numslides"/>
                          <xs:element name="relatedslideshows">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element name="relatedslideshowid">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:simpleContent>
                                      <xs:extension base="xs:string">
                                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="rank" use="optional"/>
                                      </xs:extension>
                                    </xs:simpleContent>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="privacylevel"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="flagvisible"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="showonss"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secreturl"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="allowembed"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sharewithcontacts"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>

        </xs:element>

</xs:schema>

fileformat.name: fileformat
fileformat.description: File format to search for. Default is 'all'. ('pdf':PDF,'ppt':PowerPoint,'odp':Open Office,'pps':PowerPoint Slideshow,'pot':PowerPoint template)

cc_adapt.name: cc_adapt
cc_adapt.description: Set to '1' for results under Creative Commons that allow adaption, modification. Default is '0'

get_transcript.name: get_transcript
get_transcript.description: Set it to 1 if you want to return with transcript parameter in the response. requires detailed to be set to 1.

cc_commercial.name: cc_commercial
cc_commercial.description: Set to '1' to retrieve results with the commercial Creative Commons license. Default is '0'

download.name: download
download.description: Slideshows that are available to download; Set to '0' to do this, otherwise default is all slideshows.

file_type.name: file_type
file_type.description: File type to search for. Default is 'all'. ('presentations', 'documents', 'webinars','videos')

page.name: page
page.description: The page number of the results (works in conjunction with items_per_page), default is 1

what.name: what
what.description: What type of search. If not set, text search is used. 'tag' is the other option.

upload_date.name: upload_date
upload_date.description: The time period you want to restrict your search to. 'week' would restrict to the last week. (default is 'any')

items_per_page.name: items_per_page
items_per_page.description: Number of results to return per page, default is 12

cc.name: cc
cc.description: Set to '1' to retrieve results under the Creative Commons license. Default is '0'

methods.description: Returns slideshows according to the search criteria

slideshow_id.name: slideshow_id
slideshow_id.description: Id of slideshow which is being edited

slideshow_id.name: slideshow_id
slideshow_id.description: Id of slideshow which is being deleted

upload_url.name: upload_url
upload_url.description: string containing an url pointing to the power point file: ex: http://domain.tld/directory/my_power_point.ppt

make_src_public.name: make_src_public
make_src_public.description: Y if you want users to be able to download the ppt file, N otherwise. Default is Y

campaign_id.name: campaign_id
campaign_id.description: campaign id to select the leads form

application/xml.name: application/xml
application/xml.example:
<campaigns>
    
 <leadcampaign> 
  <id>
   1
  </id> 
  <name>
   {name of campaign}
  </name> 
  <slideshowid>
   1
  </slideshowid> 
  <requiresphone>
   true
  </requiresphone> 
  <requiresaddress>
   true
  </requiresaddress> 
  <targetedregion></targetedregion> 
  <fortagged>
   {tag targeted(if any)}
  </fortagged> 
  <calltoaction>
   {call to action text}
  </calltoaction> 
  <offertext>
   {offer text}
  </offertext> 
  <startedat>
   {datetime}
  </startedat> 
  <pausedat>
   {datetime}
  </pausedat> 
  <createdat>
   {datetime}
  </createdat> 
  <updatedat>
   {datetime}
  </updatedat> 
  <endedat>
   {datetime}
  </endedat> 
  <maximumdailyspend currency="USD">
   {$}
  </maximumdailyspend> 
  <costperlead currency="USD">
   {$}
  </costperlead> 
  <formposition>
   end
  </formposition> 
  <formblocking>
   true
  </formblocking> 
  <fordownload>
   true
  </fordownload> 
  <forsidebar>
   true
  </forsidebar> 
  <stateofcampaign>
   Running
  </stateofcampaign> 
 </leadcampaign>
    ?
    
 <promotioncampaign> 
  <id>
   1
  </id> 
  <name>
   {name of campaign}
  </name> 
  <slideshowid>
   1
  </slideshowid> 
  <targetedregion>
   {name of country}
  </targetedregion> 
  <fortagged>
   {tag targeted(if any)}
  </fortagged> 
  <startedat>
   {datetime}
  </startedat> 
  <pausedat>
   {datetime}
  </pausedat> 
  <createdat>
   {datetime}
  </createdat> 
  <updatedat>
   {datetime}
  </updatedat> 
  <endedat>
   {datetime}
  </endedat> 
  <maximumdailyspend>
   {$}
  </maximumdailyspend> 
  <slidesharecategory>
   {category name}
  </slidesharecategory> 
  <promotiontype>
   {category or contextual}
  </promotiontype> 
  <cpc>
   {$}
  </cpc> 
  <clickstoday>
   100
  </clickstoday> 
  <clicksalltime>
   100
  </clicksalltime> 
  <impressionstoday>
   50
  </impressionstoday> 
  <impressionsalltime>
   50
  </impressionsalltime> 
  <ctr>
   0.5
  </ctr> 
  <pausecause>
   {text: can be "userAction", "dailyLimit", or "noFund"}
  </pausecause> 
  <stateofcampaign>
   {txt: Running, Paused, Stopped
  </stateofcampaign> 
 </promotioncampaign>
    ?

</campaigns>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="campaigns">
    <xs:complexType mixed="true">
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="leadcampaign">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="slideshowid"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="requiresphone"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="requiresaddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="targetedregion"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="fortagged"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="calltoaction"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="offertext"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="startedat"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="pausedat"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="createdat"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="updatedat"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="endedat"/>
              <xs:element name="maximumdailyspend">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:simpleContent>
                    <xs:extension base="xs:string">
                      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="currency"/>
                    </xs:extension>
                  </xs:simpleContent>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="costperlead">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:simpleContent>
                    <xs:extension base="xs:string">
                      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="currency"/>
                    </xs:extension>
                  </xs:simpleContent>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="formposition"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="formblocking"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="fordownload"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="forsidebar"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="stateofcampaign"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="promotioncampaign">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="slideshowid"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="targetedregion"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="fortagged"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="startedat"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="pausedat"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="createdat"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="updatedat"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="endedat"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="maximumdailyspend"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="slidesharecategory"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="promotiontype"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cpc"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="clickstoday"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="clicksalltime"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="impressionstoday"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="impressionsalltime"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ctr"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="pausecause"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="stateofcampaign"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

documentation.title: Headline
documentation.content: SlideShare began with a simple goal: To share knowledge online. Since then, SlideShare has grown to become the world's largest community for sharing presentations and other professional content.
